body_en: The topic of Nazism was also used as white noise during the coverage of the events in [Bucha](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2022/4/4/will-the-bucha-massacre-wake-up-the-world), where in early April, after the retreat of the Russian army, many traces of a massacre were found.
name: mythical-nazis-21-DefaultText
